attributes.action: Agree to abide by the opinions of its scientific advisory boards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should not appoint independent scientific advisors then cherry pick its advice to suit political agendas.

We ask the Prime Minister to respect scientific advice, reinstate Professor Nutt and ask Alan Johnson to resign as Home Secretary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
